title: Where did that thread go about the Type ID reward???...
content:
Hi Yall:

That tread vanished!

I remember Cris Keegan participated. I’m not sure if I did.  
What was totally weird or profoundly unusual was the person wanting the ID was offering a $25 reward.

VLLG Traitor was suggested—close but not it.

Anyways I found it the exact match:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807040400im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FontNeeded_6030.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807040400im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_boback_6323.gif)
  
 [http://baselinefonts.com/launch/introducing\_boback-5.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807040400/http:/baselinefonts.com/launch/introducing_boback-5.html "http://baselinefonts.com/launch/introducing\_boback-5.html")  
 [http://baselinefonts.com/launch/contact\_us/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20100807040400/http:/baselinefonts.com/launch/contact_us/index.php "http://baselinefonts.com/launch/contact\_us/index.php")

Baseline’s website is all messed up. I’m not sure of the font is called Jamiroquai or Bobeck.

Anyway. There it is.

ahahahah!

Mike Diaz :-)

PS... I am not even sure if anyone else got it right. Oh, well, just being thorough.
author: SuperUltraFabulous
